EmailTemplate.description: Notify Sales Manager that a Retail Inspection has been completed.
EmailTemplate.name: A new Retail Inspection has been submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: A new {!Legend_Inspection__c.RecordType} has been submitted!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A new {!Legend_Inspection__c.RecordType} has been submitted by {!Legend_Inspection__c.CreatedBy}. You can review the inspection by clicking the URL below.
